name: AWS Lambda
why: We use a custom function to send your contact form emails.
content: AWS Lambda free tier includes 1M free requests per month and up to 3.2M GB-seconds of compute time per month, depending on the memory required to run your logic.

name: Mailgun API
content: Mailgun offers a free account allowing you to send up to 10K transactional emails per month. At no extra cost you also get the ability to track email events such as: delivered, failed, opened.
note: If you need to send more than 10K emails, scaling can be enabled by adding payment details.

name: AWS S3 Storage
content: To make your website accessible through the web, it needs to be stored and hosted on a web server. The AWS S3 hosting free tier offers 5GB standard storage, 20K GET requests and 2K PUT requests, per month.
note: Free tier expires after 12 months & available to new S3 customers only. Refer to pricing for storage and requests only.

name: 1&1 Internet
content: Your web address or domain [e.g kioskwebdev.co.uk] needs to be hosted separately with a Domain Registrar.

name: G Suite
content: G Suite Professional offers 30GB of storage for email and documents. A 3 month subscription for one user is included as part of this implementation. 14-day free trial is available.
note: Allows addition of group email aliases at no extra cost - e.g software@kioskwebdev.co.uk & support@kioskwebdev.co.uk.
